CustomField.description: You can send emails to the current user by specifying the Name of the Custom Setting to start with "CurrentUser" (no quotes). Example: CurrentUser_ForSuchAndSuch.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: You can send emails to the current user by specifying the Name of the Custom Setting to start with "CurrentUser" (no quotes). Example: CurrentUser_ForSuchAndSuch.
CustomField.label: Email
